MWTools 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Converts units from EJ to ktoe

    specify_ktoe.Rd

    Primary-final-useful (PFU) data from calc_hmw_pfu() and calc_amw_pfu() are in EJ. This function converts entries in the energy_col from EJ (exajoules) to ktoe and changes the units_col from "EJ" to "ktoe".

    specify_ktoe(
  .df,
  energy_col = MWTools::mw_cols$e_dot,
  units_col = MWTools::mw_cols$unit
)

    Arguments

    .df

    A data frame with units_col and energy_col columns.

    energy_col, units_col

    See MWTools::mw_constants.

    Value

    .df with energy column converted from EJ to ktoe.

    Details

    Prior to converting the energy_col from EJ to ktoe, the units_col is verified to contain only "EJ". An error is thrown if any units_col entry is not in EJ.

    Examples

    hmw_test_data_path() %>%
  read.csv() %>%
  calc_hmw_pfu() %>%
  specify_ktoe()
#> # A tibble: 864 × 7
#>    Country  Year Species       Stage   Sector      Unit  E.dot
#>    <chr>   <dbl> <chr>         <chr>   <chr>       <chr> <dbl>
#>  1 GBR      1969 Human females Final   Agriculture ktoe  23.7 
#>  2 GBR      1969 Human females Primary Agriculture ktoe  38.2 
#>  3 GBR      1969 Human females Useful  Agriculture ktoe   1.41
#>  4 GBR      1970 Human females Final   Agriculture ktoe  23.2 
#>  5 GBR      1970 Human females Primary Agriculture ktoe  37.4 
#>  6 GBR      1970 Human females Useful  Agriculture ktoe   1.37
#>  7 GBR      1971 Human females Final   Agriculture ktoe  22.3 
#>  8 GBR      1971 Human females Primary Agriculture ktoe  35.9 
#>  9 GBR      1971 Human females Useful  Agriculture ktoe   1.31
#> 10 GBR      1972 Human females Final   Agriculture ktoe  21.7 
#> # … with 854 more rows
